channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6947] More fixes for tests on hadoop-2
item.description: Few more fixes for test cases on hadoop-2
item.summary: More fixes for tests on hadoop-2

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12641157

Just a bit of explanation on auto_sortmerge_join_16: the query results had been changed by HIVE-6455, looks like a subsequent fix has restored the result set back to its original results.

+1
Remove union_remove_17.q as its not an expected output. The duplication of partition columns in RSOp will be fixed in HIVE-6956.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
